resources.string:
This app changes your disk encryption password.
It REQUIRES root access to work.

Make sure you remember your new password or you will NOT be able to use your device.
Use at your own risk!
Are you sure you want to change the device encryption password?\nYou will need to enter the new password at next boot, make sure you remember it!
Failed to change device encryption password.\n Use the \'vdc cryptfs changepw <password>\' command in a root shell to set the password manually BEFORE rebooting.
This device is not encrypted, exiting.
Successfully changed password.\n\nThe device encryption password is now: %s
The current encryption password is incorrect.
